title: Hell's broke loose
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Printed by W. W[hite] and are to be sold by G. Loftus in Popes-head Allie neare the Exchange,
notes: "The argument" initialed: S.R., i.e. Samuel Rowlands.
On the Dutch rebel John Leyden.
Running title reads: The life and death of Iohn Leyden.
